docs.snippet: The martial art of muaythai and cheerleading, with its strong youth appeal, received provisional recognition as Olympic sports by the International Olympic Committee on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The martial art of muaythai and cheerleading, with its strong youth appeal, received provisional recognition as Olympic sports by the International Olympic Committee on Tuesday.

headline.main: Muaythai, Cheerleading Granted Provisional Olympic Status
headline.print_headline: Muaythai, Cheerleading Granted Provisional Olympic Status

docs.snippet: The recognition will last for up to three years and will lay the groundwork for each sport to apply for inclusion in the Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: The recognition will last for up to three years and will lay the groundwork for each sport to apply for inclusion in the Olympics.
docs.abstract: International Olympic Committee votes to recognize cheerleading and combat sport Muay Thai, guaranteeing both sports funding and chance to apply for inclusion in Olympics; move reflects IOC's interest in sports that appeal to younger generation.

headline.main: Cheerleading and Muay Thai Given Provisional Olympic Status
headline.print_headline: I.O.C. Backs Cheerleading and Muay Thai

docs.snippet: IMF chief Christine Lagarde will ask for a postponement of a trial aimed at establishing her role in a 400-million-euro ($428 million) payout to businessman Bernard Tapie as another investigation of the case is ongoing, her lawyer told Reuters....

docs.snippet: South Korean President Park Geun-hye, engulfed in an influence peddling scandal, said if she was impeached she would wait for a court to uphold the decision, a party official said on Tuesday, a sign a political crisis could drag on for months....
